column2: Word is spreading that a [Root.Religion.GetName] missionary, Hassan-i Sabbah, has founded a religious order known as the 'Hashshashin' somewhere in western Persia. Using trickery and guile, this mysterious cult of trained killers has seized control of the mountain fortress of Alamut and converted it into their headquarters. Already a string of violent murders can be traced back to Hassan's devoted and fearless disciples...

column2: Finally, a new era of righteousness has begun. For many years we have worked in the shadows, but the rumors are no longer whispered. The name of 'Hassan-i Sabbah', the conqueror of our mountain fortress of Alamut, is known throughout [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] and beyond. The faithful and meek shall find shelter under our wings while the impious and infidels shall fear our fury!

column2: The Hashshashin, the elusive Order of Assassins, have expanded their influence into Syria. A branch of their sect has established itself in the mountain fortress of Masyaf, from where they control the surrounding countryside. All across the Holy Land, the Assassins are now hunting those they see as obstacles to their obscure plans...

column2: With the fall of their last fortress, the Hashshashin - the notorious Assassin Order - has been scattered to the winds. The few remaining members of the order have gone into hiding, biding their time in the vain hope that they will one day be able to resume their work.
